title: (x) "secarea" string in lower case - Planet Kosmos {Mrten F, Rainer}
content:
Hi everyone.. i m looking for the font from this strange logo..  
i have to type some new words as slogan for this logo in same font, but for days searching i cant get the name of this font.

it will be very helpful if someone can show me where i can buy this font.. thank you very much

 [‹ (x) ornate display face/inline geometric sans - Posphate/Fantasie Artistique {Mikey D/David H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116143952/http:/typophile.com/node/38659 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Smart ideas come to life…" tech sans in Adobe ad - Neo Tech {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116143952/http:/typophile.com/node/39041 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simwong

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116143952im_/http:/typophile.com/files/secarea_4786.jpg)

Sorry i miss the image file, it’s here

Looks like House SpaceAge Black that has been skewed.

Edit: nah, not quite.
You’ll find it on “free” font sites under the name of Planet Kosmos...
That’s [Planet Kosmos](http://web.archive.org/web/20071116143952/http:/www.dafont.com/planet-kosmos.font?nb_ppp=50&af=on&text=secarea) by Mads Rydal. Free for personal use.
That’s it!! thank you guys, thank you very much... it really helps.
